resources.string: Conversiones y Operaciones en cualquier base

-Conversions: Enter a positive or negative, integer or fractional number to convert it on any base from 2 to 16. Remember there are no negative fractional numbers, and when you are working with negative numbers, you have to enter a quantity of bits to get a correct answer. -Operations: Enter two negative or positive numbers to do basic mathematical operations. Remember both numbers have to be on the same base. If you are working with negative numbers, put a quantity of bits to get a correct answer. -Precisions: Enter a negative or positive, integer and fractional number and its base. In this option you wil be able to understand IEEE-754 FLOATING PINT numbers
